mapper.insert: insert into bas_pacu_monitor_config (eventId, eventName, `precision`, frequency, `max`, `min`, amendFlag, color, iconId, eventDesc, mustShow, mustCollect, `position`, units, deviceType, beid ) values (#{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{precision,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{frequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{max,jdbcType=REAL}, #{min,jdbcType=REAL}, #{amendFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mustShow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mustCollect,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{units,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update bas_pacu_monitor_config
eventName = #{eventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
precision = #{precision,jdbcType=INTEGER},
frequency = #{frequency,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max = #{max,jdbcType=REAL},
min = #{min,jdbcType=REAL},
amendFlag = #{amendFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
iconId = #{iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eventDesc = #{eventDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mustShow = #{mustShow,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mustCollect = #{mustCollect,jdbcType=INTEGER},
position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER},
units = #{units,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deviceType = #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where eventId = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bas_pacu_monitor_config set eventName = #{eventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, precision = #{precision,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frequency = #{frequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max = #{max,jdbcType=REAL}, min = #{min,jdbcType=REAL}, amendFlag = #{amendFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iconId = #{iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eventDesc = #{eventDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mustShow = #{mustShow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mustCollect = #{mustCollect,jdbcType=INTEGER}, position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, units = #{units,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deviceType = #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where eventId = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM bas_pacu_monitor_config a RIGHT JOIN bas_pacu_device_monitor_config b ON a.`eventId` = b.`eventId` and a.beid = b.beid WHERE a.deviceType = #{deviceType} AND b.`deviceId` = #{deviceId} and a.beid = #{beid} ORDER BY eventId
